{"blocks":[{"key":"btgas","text":"Clean-up the amplicons using the following protocol:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"24nf0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"11gaq","text":"Add an equal volume (1:1) of AmpureXP beads to the sample tube and mix by pipetting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f5m2","text":"Incubate for 5 min at room temperature. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cuj0b","text":"Pellet on magnet for 5 min. Remove supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eqmj5","text":"Add 200 ul of 80% ethanol to the pellet and wash twice. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1tvjr","text":"Let the beads dry for 3 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c46al","text":"Add 30 ul elution buffer and resuspend the beads. Incubate for 3 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9mkeo","text":"Pellet on magnet for 5 min. Remove and keep eluate (30 ul). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dc71t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"43n9v","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"470qj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":23,"offset":45,"style":"bold"}],"key":"bjumm","text":"Amplicon clean-up should be performed in the post-PCR cabinet which should should be cleaned with decontamination wipes and UV sterilised before and after use.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bip9o","text":"AMPLICON QUANTIFICATION AND NORMALIZATION","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":41}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"16js1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9d539","text":"Quantify the amplicon pools using a fluorimetric dsDNA assay. (e.g: PicoGreen with a standard curve 0-200ng)   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fmglg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9ulbm","text":"We expect following concentrations:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"btkih","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dd22t","text":"Pool 1+2 combined:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1bk4d","text":"100-150 ng/ul for Ct 14-24","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c8tt4","text":"30-80 ng/ul for Ct 25-29","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"32lp","text":"10-30 ng/ul for Ct 30-36","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"enddp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9brtq","text":"Nextera Flex Library Prep: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":27},{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9rdkr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1p9if","text":"After quantification of Pool 1+2, take a new plate and add 150 ng of Pool 1+2  and add up with nuclease-free water to a total volume of 30 ul (= 5 ng/ul). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":136,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"90b8t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7orbl","text":"Nanopore Library Prep: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23},{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dd3te","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6p039","text":"After quantification of Pool 1+2, take a new plate and add 200 ng of Pool 1+2  and add up with nuclease-free water to a total volume of 20 ul (= 10 ng/ul). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":135,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
